title: art_works
description: JSON schema for the art_works table

email.description: The email of the person who created the artwork.

issuer_id.description: The ID of the person who issued the artwork.

artist.description: The name of the artist who created the artwork.

creationyear.description: The year the artwork was created.

materials.description: The materials used to create the artwork.

document.description: The document associated with the artwork.

display_location.description: The location where the artwork is displayed.

tokens.description: The number of tokens associated with the artwork.

tokens_for_sale.description: The number of tokens available for sale for the artwork.

price_per_token.description: The price per token for the artwork.

listing_starts.description: The date when the artwork listing starts.

listing_ends.description: The date when the artwork listing ends.

holding_period_ends.description: The date when the holding period for the artwork ends.

art_pix1.description: The first picture of the artwork
